name: Super Smash Flash 2 Recording File
summary: An SSFREC file contains a recording created by McLeodGaming Super Smash Flash 2, a fanmade Flash game based on Super Smash Bros Brawl. It stores game replay information, such as the characters, levels, and movements of the characters, used by Super Smash Flash 2 to replay gameplay. SSFREC files do not store actual video and cannot be converted to a video file.
